name: Modules.CoreMotion
summary: Allows Titanium client applications to access Apple's CoreMotion APIs.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.summary: Properties to set on a new object, including any defined by Modules.CoreMotion.Accelerometer except those marked not-creation or read-only.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.summary: Properties to set on a new object, including any defined by Modules.CoreMotion.Altimeter except those marked not-creation or read-only.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.summary: Properties to set on a new object, including any defined by Modules.CoreMotion.DeviceMotion except those marked not-creation or read-only.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.summary: Properties to set on a new object, including any defined by Modules.CoreMotion.Gyroscope except those marked not-creation or read-only.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.summary: Properties to set on a new object, including any defined by Modules.CoreMotion.Magnetometer except those marked not-creation or read-only.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.summary: Properties to set on a new object, including any defined by Modules.CoreMotion.MotionActivity except those marked not-creation or read-only.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.summary: Properties to set on a new object, including any defined by Modules.CoreMotion.Pedometer except those marked not-creation or read-only.

deprecated.notes: This API was deprecated by Apple in iOS 7 and is only available for backward compatibility with older versions of this module. It will be removed in the next release. Please use Modules.CoreMotion.Pedometer API instead, which provides the same functionality including new properties like floorCount and distance.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.summary: Properties to set on a new object, including any defined by Modules.CoreMotion.StepCounter except those marked not-creation or read-only.

constants.name: ATTITUDE_REFERENCE_FRAME_X_ARBITRARY_CORRECTED_Z_VERTICAL
constants.summary: Describes the same reference frame as ATTITUDE_REFERENCE_FRAME_X_ARBITRARY_Z_VERTICAL except that the magnetometer, when available and calibrated, is used to improve long-term yaw accuracy. Using this constant instead of ATTITUDE_REFERENCE_FRAME_X_ARBITRARY_Z_VERTICAL results in increased CPU usage.

constants.name: ATTITUDE_REFERENCE_FRAME_X_ARBITRARY_Z_VERTICAL
constants.summary: Describes a reference frame in which the Z axis is vertical and the X axis points in an arbitrary direction in the horizontal plane.

constants.name: ATTITUDE_REFERENCE_FRAME_X_MAGNETIC_NORTH_Z_VERTICAL
constants.summary: Describes a reference frame in which the Z axis is vertical and the X axis points toward magnetic north. Note that using this reference frame may require device movement to calibrate the magnetometer.

constants.name: ATTITUDE_REFERENCE_FRAME_X_TRUE_NORTH_Z_VERTICAL
constants.summary: Describes a reference frame in which the Z axis is vertical and the X axis points toward true north. Note that using this reference frame may require device movement to calibrate the magnetometer. It also requires the location to be available in order to calculate the difference between magnetic and true north.

constants.name: AUTHORIZATION_STATUS_AUTHORIZED
constants.summary: Access is authorized by the user.

constants.name: AUTHORIZATION_STATUS_DENIED
constants.summary: Access is denied by the user.

constants.name: AUTHORIZATION_STATUS_NOT_DETERMINED
constants.summary: The user has not been prompted yet.

constants.name: AUTHORIZATION_STATUS_RESTRICTED
constants.summary: Access is denied due to system-wide restrictions.

constants.name: ERROR_DEVICE_REQUIRES_MOVEMENT
constants.summary: The device must move for a sampling of motion data to occur.

constants.name: ERROR_INVALID_PARAMETER
constants.summary: An invalid parameter was specified.

constants.name: ERROR_MOTION_ACTIVITY_NOT_AUTHORIZED
constants.summary: The app is not currently authorized to use motion activity support.

constants.name: ERROR_MOTION_ACTIVITY_NOT_AVAILABLE
constants.summary: Motion activity support is not available on the current device.

constants.name: ERROR_MOTION_ACTIVITY_NOT_ENTITLED
constants.summary: The app is missing a required entitlement.

constants.name: ERROR_NULL
constants.summary: No error.

constants.name: ERROR_TRUE_NORTH_NOT_AVAILABLE
constants.summary: True north is not available on this device. This usually indicates that the device's location is not yet available.

constants.name: ERROR_UNKNOWN
constants.summary: An unknown error occurred.

constants.name: MAGNETIC_FIELD_CALIBRATION_ACCURACY_HIGH
constants.summary: The accuracy of the magnetic field calibration is high.

constants.name: MAGNETIC_FIELD_CALIBRATION_ACCURACY_LOW
constants.summary: The accuracy of the magnetic field calibration is low.

constants.name: MAGNETIC_FIELD_CALIBRATION_ACCURACY_MEDIUM
constants.summary: The accuracy of the magnetic field calibration is medium.

constants.name: MAGNETIC_FIELD_CALIBRATION_ACCURACY_UNCALIBRATED
constants.summary: The magnetic field estimate is not calibrated.

constants.name: MOTION_ACTIVITY_CONFIDENCE_HIGH
constants.summary: Confidence is high.

constants.name: MOTION_ACTIVITY_CONFIDENCE_LOW
constants.summary: Confidence is low.

constants.name: MOTION_ACTIVITY_CONFIDENCE_MEDIUM
constants.summary: Confidence is good.
